Name: "Bank Zero" Rules
Desc: A simple brochure outlining the benefits and relevant rules of loyalty points with "Bank Zero."
Desc2:
"For your own rights and benefits, please read carefully. The Bank reserves the right of final interpretation."

While these two prominent sentences stand out in the brochure, the rest of the text is crammed into a tiny font, making it dizzying to read. But aren't those parts the most important?
